Gradual light change in EasyLiving lab
00000 - start with lights dim, brightening begins
01831 - John enters scene, sits, reads book
01918 - John leaves
03072 - John enters, sits, reads phone book
03244 - John leaves, lights start dimming from max brightness
04739 - John enters, sits, reads phone book
04933 - John leaves
05889 - end, ligts back to dim

Testing
00000 - 00199 Train (lights dim & brightening)
00200 - 01850 Run
01850 Evaluate (John in scene, lights brighter)
